Author: little-pinkie
Text: Thank you! I guess I “relapsed” again 4 days ago. I wasn’t really better just went a month or so without doing it. You stay safe too! Xx

Author: plutocity
Text: I use binging and purging when things get stressful or I feel particularly lonely, it is a strange sort of comfort, at least I call it that, it's really just self harm I guess. I also have no friends, which is okay most of the time but some weeks are unbearably lonely. I actually relapsed into b/p again today so this post really stuck out to me. I know me saying that isn't really helpful, your post just struck me in a familiar way,  and I wanted to let you know you aren' t alone. I hope things get better for you, stay safe! Hugs.
